long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features：

1、Custom Prompt Library: Users can create and manage their own library of AI prompts for quick use.

2、Enhanced AI Interactions: Improve efficiency and quality of interactions with AI through custom prompts.

3、Local Search: Easily find the needed content within your prompt library to enhance search efficiency.

4、Privacy Protection: All prompts are stored locally, ensuring user data is secure and private.
5、One-Click Download: Choose between downloading prompts as .txt (plain text) or .md (Markdown) files, providing you with the flexibility to work with your content in the format that best suits your needs.

In short, chatGPT Prompts Manager is a Chrome extension that enables users to interact with AI more efficiently and personally.
